column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I wanted to try their famous almond and chocolate croissant
column2: but sadly by the time I got there
column3: they were sold out. So I went for the oatmeal pie and the choux. I really liked the oatmeal pie
column4: which reminds me of my childhood. The oatmeal cookies were large and soft. The cream inside was creamy and not too sweet
column5: which was perfect with the cookie. The choux was okay and I've had better. The cream is similar to whipped cream and the pastry was a little too dry for me.
